text:
It is a porsh area but not everything are pricey there. You still can find affordable shops and reasonable pricing stores too.
The whole area is built in a European concept
Not really central but enough food and shop options. Banquet party too. But I still prefer the f&b options along the street.
New and beautiful layout mall, however upscale restaurant and retail merchandise would be much appreciated. Upper floors are still much available.

Nice place to eat, shop and stay. Ate at  Toast House Cafe. The lady boss is so polite and sweet. She recommended their speciality and waited patiently for us to order. She also acceded to our special request of less salt and oil. Will visit again soon.

The area is a good place for food, bars, services and some education centres.

Really busy during peak hours and weekends. Hence, parking can be challenging but most people don't they can park in the Eco Galleria area.
